mapper.select: select rfqno,company,pn,mfg,qty,qlty,dtcd,tp,dtime,sure,rdate,isOpen,q.name qltyName from rfqlist r,qltytype q where r.qlty=q.id and r.rfqno=#{rfqno}
select rfqno,company,pn,mfg,qty,dtcd,qlty,tp,dtime,sure,rdate,isOpen,q.name qltyName from rfqlist r,qltytype q where r.qlty=q.id and r.rfqno=#{rfqno}

select rfqno,company,pn,mfg,qty,dtcd,qlty,tp,dtime,sure,rdate,isOpen,q.name qltyName from rfqlist r,qltytype q where r.qlty=q.id
and pn like concat('%',#{pn},'%')
and pntype=#{pntype}
